title: How to Make Violet Frosting

steps.headline: Add the flour to the saucepan.
Pour in a few tablespoons of the milk, enough to make a paste.
steps.description: Once there is a smooth paste, add the remaining milk.

steps.headline: Stir the milk and flour mixture constantly over medium heat until thickened.
Remove from the heat and leave to cool.
Cream the butter with the violet sugar and salt.
Pour in the cooled thickened milk mixture.
steps.description: Beat the two mixtures together until it whips up into a soft, light mix.

steps.headline: Spread on cupcakes or a single cake as planned.
steps.description: Add a crystallised violet in the centre of cupcakes for an added decorative feature.

text: Add the flour to the saucepan.  Pour in a few tablespoons of the milk, enough to make a paste. Once there is a smooth paste, add the remaining milk. Stir the milk and flour mixture constantly over medium heat until thickened.  Remove from the heat and leave to cool.  Cream the butter with the violet sugar and salt.  Pour in the cooled thickened milk mixture. Beat the two mixtures together until it whips up into a soft, light mix. Spread on cupcakes or a single cake as planned. Add a crystallised violet in the centre of cupcakes for an added decorative feature.
